SA20bsa034_u:4477: yathā neme dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante api tvabhilāpātmakaḥ svabhāva eṣāṃ nāsti teneme niḥsvabhāvā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:4478: yadyapyetavabhilāpyavastu vidyate yadāśrityābhilāpāḥ pravartante tadapi yairabhilāpairyat svabhāvamabhilapyate tadapi na tatsvabhāva paramārthataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4479: tasmānnirvastukā ityucyante evañca sati te 'bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvā dharmāṇāmādita eva sarveṇa (Dutt 181)
SA20bsa034_u:4481: te kimutpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmādanutpannā aniruddhā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:4482: tadyathā cākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpakarmāṇi copalabhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:4483: sarveṣāñca teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ rūpakarmaṇāṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4485: yadā ca punastad rūpaṃ tāni ca rūpakarmāṇyapanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4486: evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante /
SA20bsa034_u:4487: sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4488_1: prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:4489: na ca tasmāt paramanyaṃ svabhāvamasya mṛgayante /
SA20bsa034_u:4491: tadyathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:4492: na ca punaḥ sarveṇaiva sarvaṃ nāsti tanmāyākṛtam /
SA20bsa034_u:4493: evaṃ na caite dharmā yathaivābhilāpasaṃstavavaśena khyānti bālānāṃ tathaiva saṃvidyante /
SA20bsa034_u:4494: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante pāramārthika-nirabhilāpyātmanā /
SA20bsa034_u:4495: te cānena nayapraveśena na santo nāsanta ityadvayā māyāvat /
SA20bsa034_u:4497: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāddharmadhātorna kiñcidutkṣipati na ca kiñcit pratikṣipati nonī-karoti nādhikaṃ karoti na vināśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4501: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya vibandhasthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvo bhojanapānādi-daśa-kāyādipariṣkārārthikānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] vipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:4502_0: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyā vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvatsacecchīlaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:4502_1: samādāya vartadhve evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhojanapānādīn kāyapariṣkārānyāvadarthamanupradāsyāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:4506: evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vistareṇa yāvatkṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:4508: sa cenmātṛjñāḥ [pitṛjñā] bhavatheti vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyasanādvimocayiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:4510: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat vistareṇaivamahaṃ bhavato 'smādbhayāt paritrāsyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:4512: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavatāṃ priyasamāgamamapriyavinābhāvaṃ copasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:4514: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyādhiduḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:4515: te ca sattvāḥ evaṃ vibandhāvasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghuladhveva tasmin kuśalasamādāne pāpaprahāṇe ca yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4517_0: ye punaḥ sattvā evaṃ vibandhasthāyino bodhisattvasya yathāparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na
SA20bsa034_u:4517_1: laghu-laghveva yathākāmaṃ pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvo yathā parikīrtitairvastubhirarthikānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:4519: vyasanasthān bhītānpriyāpriyasaṃyogavisaṃyogakāmān vyādhiduḥkhena ārtān sattvān kañcitkālamadhyupekṣate hitakāmatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:4521: te ca sattvā evaṃ niṣṭhurakarmaṇā pratipadyamānasya bodhisattvasya na tvāśayataḥ apareṇa samayena yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti pāpaprahāṇāya kuśalasamādānāya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:4523: bodhisattvasya nāpi ca vyasanasthā nāpi vistareṇa yāvadvyādhitāste cāsya saṃstutāḥ sapraṇayāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4524: tānapi bodhisattvastasminneva kuśala-[mūle] samādāpayati yaduta mātṛjñatāyāṃ vistareṇa yāvacchīlasamādānānuvartanāyām /
SA20bsa034_u:4525: ta evaṃ bodhisattvena samādāpyamānāḥ sa cedvikampanena [na] pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kupitamapyātmānamupadarśayati hitakāmatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:4531: visabhāgo 'sya bodhisattvasya teṣu [sattveṣu] tasyāśceṣṭāyāḥ sa āśayo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4532: tena ca tānsattvāṃstasmin pāpaprahāṇe kuśalasamādāne ca sanniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4535: iha bodhisattvaḥ svāmibhūto vā rājabhūto vā ādhipatyaprāptaḥ svaṃ vā parijanaṃ sva vā vijitamevaṃ samyak samanuśāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:4536_0: yo me kaścitparijane vā vijite vā 'mātṛjño bhaviṣyati vistareṇa yāvaddauśīlyaṃ samādāya
SA20bsa034_u:4536_1: vartiṣyate tasyāhamucitaṃ vā bhaktācchādanaṃ samucchetsyāmi vārayiṣyāmi vā tāḍayiṣyāmi
SA20bsa034_u:4536_2: vā sarvasvena vā viyojayiṣyāmi sarveṇa vā sarva vijitāt pravāsayiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:4537: tatra ca karmaṇi kuśalān dakṣān pauruṣeyānviniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4538: te ca sattvāstasmānmahato daṇḍakarmaṇo bhītāḥ pāpañca prajahati kuśalañca samādāya vartante /
SA20bsa034_u:4539: akāmakā api tena balāvaṣṭambhena kuśale sanniyojyante te sattvā anenopāyena /
SA20bsa034_u:4542: saha bodhisattvena yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvamevopakāraḥ parīttaḥ prabhūto vā kṛto bhavati dānena vā vyasanaparitrāṇatayā (Dutt 184)
SA20bsa034_u:4543_0: vā bhayaparitrāṇatayā vā priyāpriyasaṃyogavisayogopasaṃharaṇatayā vā vyādhisaśamanatayā
SA20bsa034_u:4543_1: vā teṣāṃ kṛtajñānāṃ kṛtavedināṃ pratyupakāra-kāmānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ kuśalasamādānameva
SA20bsa034_u:4547_0: sa cedyūyameva mātṛjñā bhavatha pitṛjñā vistareṇa yāvacchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve
SA20bsa034_u:4547_1: kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ kuśalasamādānaṃ parataḥ pratyāsaṃśate tena copāyena parāṃstatra
SA20bsa034_u:4550: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bodhisattvabhūmi-sthito bodhisattvaḥ suviśodhitabodhisattvamārgastuṣite devanikāye upapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4552: sa na cirasyedānīṃ jambūdvīpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4555: punarbodhisattvastuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā ucce vā sammate vā kule upapadyate yaduta rājakule vā purohitakule vā /
SA20bsa034_u:4563: nāvaramātrakametaddharmākhyānaṃ bhavati yatredānīṃ brahmā [svayaṃ] dharmadeśanāyai bhagavantamadhyeṣata iti /
SA20bsa034_u:4566: paravyāpāritena na tu svena sattveṣu kāruṇyacittena nātmana eva pratirupatāṃ viditveti /
SA20bsa034_u:4572: yasmādupāyādanya upāya uttari atikrāntataraśca praṇītataraśca nāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:4574_1: sattvānāṃ pratighātāya nayanāya madhyasthānāmavatārāyāvatīrṇānāṃ paripākāya paripakkānāṃ vimocanāya /
SA20bsa034_u:4584_0: iha bodhisattvastadrūpāṃ smṛtiprajñābalādhānatāṃ pratilabhate yathā śrutamātrakeṇaivānāmnātān
SA20bsa034_u:4590: iha bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ samādhivaśitāṃ pratilabhate yathā yāni mantrapadānīti saṃśamanāya sattvānāmadhitiṣṭhanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4595_0: iha bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pragāḍhahetucaritaḥ prajñāvān praviviktavihārī vācamapyanudīrayan
SA20bsa034_u:4595_1: darśanapathamapyanāgacchan kenacit saha tathā mātrābhojī asaṃkīrṇabhojī ekaprakārāśanabhojī
SA20bsa034_u:4595_2: pradhyānaparataḥ alpaṃ rātrau svapan bahu jāgran yānīmāni tathāgatabhāṣitāni bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya
SA20bsa034_u:4595_3: mantrapadāni tadyathā iṭi miṭi kiṭibhiḥ kṣāntipadāni svāhā /
SA20bsa034_u:4597: sa teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmevaṃ samyak pratipanna evamarthaṃ svayamevāśrutvā kutaścit pratividhyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4598: tad yathā nāstyeṣāṃ mantrapadānāṃ kācidarthapariniṣpattiḥ nirarthā evaite /
SA20bsa034_u:4601: iyatā tena teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaḥ supratividdho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4602: sa (Dutt 186) teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaṃ samyak pratividhya tenaivārthānusāreṇa sarvadharmāṇāmatyarthaṃ samyak pratividhyati svayamevāśrutvā parataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4606: sa evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvārthaṃ samyak pratividhya tasmātparamarthaṃ na samanveṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:4608: tena bodhisattvena pratilabdhā tāni dhāraṇīpadānyadhiṣṭhāya bodhisattvakṣāntirvaktavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:4609: tasyāśca lābhāt sa bodhisattvo na cirasyedānīmadhyāśayaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:4612: tatra dharmadhāraṇīmarthadhāraṇīñca bodhisattvaḥ prathamasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyātyayācchuddhādhyāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo labhate niyatāṃ sthirāmudārāñca /
SA20bsa034_u:4613: tataḥ punararvāg labhate praṇidhānavaśena vā dhyānasanniśrayeṇa vā natu niyatāṃ na sthirāṃ nodārām /
SA20bsa034_u:4615: bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya tu dhāraṇī yathaiva vyākhyātā tathaiva labhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4616: etāḥ punaḥ sarvā dhāraṇīrbodhisattvaścaturbhiguṇairyukto labhate nānyatamavikalaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4620: dharmārāmaśca bhavati dharmarato bodhisattvapiṭakamārabhya piṭakamātṛkāṃ vā
SA20bsa034_u:4628: āyatyāṃ sarvabodhisattvakuśalasaṃgrahāya sarvaguṇasaṃgrahāya ca samāsato vyāsato vā praṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak praṇidhānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4632: buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ saddharma-parigrahārakṣaṇatāyai dharmanetrīsandhāraṇāya mahāpraṇidhānam /
SA20bsa034_u:4642: iha bodhisattvasya sarvābhilāṣātmakena svabhāvena virahitaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu paśyataḥ yā cittasya sthitiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4645_0: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu mithyāvikalpasamutthāpitena
SA20bsa034_u:4645_1: kleśena duḥkhena ca parigṛhītatvādanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ samanupaśyato yā āyatyāṃ tatrāpraṇidhānapūrvikā cittasthitiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4648: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu sarvavikalpaprapañca nimittānyapanīya yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4651: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ dvayamidaṃ saccāsacca /
SA20bsa034_u:4652: tatra saṃskṛtamasaskṛtañca sat asadātmā vātmīyaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:4655: yat punaretadasadeva vastu tatra bodhisattvena na praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:4658: evaṃ hi bodhisattva eṣu triṣu samādhiṣu yogaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:4660: tadanyākārānapi trīnsamādhīnyathābhūta-vyavasthāna-nayapraveśena bhāvanā-nayapraveśena ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yeṣu śrāvakāḥ śikṣante samudāgacchati ca /
SA20bsa034_u:4661: catvārīmāni dharmoddānāni yāni buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye deśayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4667: etat pratisaṃyuktārtha yadbhūyasā dharmamudīrayanti buddhabodhisattvāḥ sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:4672: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4673: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4676: tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4680: tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4686: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4688: tatra pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇe svabhāvavināśānantara yo 'pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇasvabhāvaprādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiriti paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4690: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4691: tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4693: tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:4695_0: tasmācca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca eva tasya saṃskārakṣaṇa[svabhāva]syāpagamaḥ sa eva teṣāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:4695_1: jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya
SA20bsa034_u:4697: tatra bhagavatā yo bhāvastadekaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA20bsa034_u:4699: sa ca bhāvasteṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthityanyathātvaprabhāvita iti kṛtvā tṛtīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA20bsa034_u:4700: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:4703: nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām /
SA20bsa034_u:4704: saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:4706: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:4708: sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4710: evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:4714: (Dutt 190) atha ca punaranyadevaṃ sati saṃskāra-janma jātirna bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4716: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4717: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so 'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā /
SA20bsa034_u:4718: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:4719: evaṃ satyalpakṛcchreṇa nirodhasamāpannasyeva cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:4720: tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā /
SA20bsa034_u:4721: ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4722: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4724: ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4725_0: tān punareva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānādbodhisattvaḥ triḥprakārāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ
SA20bsa034_u:4726: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4727: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4733: yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4734: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4738: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4743_0: tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā 'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:4743_1: syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā
SA20bsa034_u:4743_2: vā go-aśvarathakā vā hastirathakā vā upasaṃhṛtā bhaveyuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4744: sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go 'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:4745: athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta /
SA20bsa034_u:4747: tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:4748: eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /
SA20bsa034_u:4749: athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet /
SA20bsa034_u:4750: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta /
SA20bsa034_u:4751_0: ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ
SA20bsa034_u:4751_1: varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake
SA20bsa034_u:4753_2: bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4754: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam /
SA20bsa034_u:4755: yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4757: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4763: tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet /
SA20bsa034_u:4764: sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4766: atha tasyaiva vyādhitapuruṣasya sa ca pūrvako vyādhistayā bhaiṣajyāsevayā vyupaśāmyedanyaścāpūrvo vyādhiranyabhaiṣajyasādhyaḥ prādurbhavet /
SA20bsa034_u:4767_0: atha sa mahāvaidyaḥ pūrvakasya ca vyādheḥ praśamaṃ paścimakasya cotpādamanyabhaiṣajyasādhyaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:4767_1: viditvā tañca pūrvakaṃ bhaiṣajyaprayogaṃ pratikṣipedanyaṃ cānulomikaṃ vyapadiśed bhaiṣajyam /
SA20bsa034_u:4768: sa bālo vyādhita puruṣaḥ pūrvabhaiṣajyādhimuktasteṣveva pathyasaṃjñī yenaiva mahāvaidyena tāni pūrvapaścimāni bhaiṣajyāni vyapadiṣṭāni /
SA20bsa034_u:4769_0: evamapyucyamānastena saṃmukhamapathyānyetāni pūrvakāṇi bhaiṣajyāni paścime vyādhāviti
SA20bsa034_u:4769_1: saṃpratyayena na gacchannāṣya vacanamabhiśraddhavyādevameva tadupamāste bālā bodhisattvāḥ
SA20bsa034_u:4770_2: samyagvyapadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ nāvataranti nādhimucyante na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /

SA20bsa034_u:4779: pañceme bodhisattvāsyāścaryādbhūtā dharmā anuttare samyaksaṃbodhiyāne śikṣamāṇasya veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4786: ime pañca bodhisattvānāmāścaryādbhutā dharmā asādhāraṇastadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4787: pañcemāni bodhisattvasyānāścaryāṇi yaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4789: yad bodhisattvaḥ parahitahetukena duḥkhena sukhātmaka eva san kṛtsnaṃ parahitahetukaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:4790: idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4791: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ saṃsāradoṣajño nirvāṇaguṇajña eva ca san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā saṃsāramabhyupagacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:4793: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvastūṣṇīṃbhāva-sukharasajña eva san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaṃ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmedeśanāyai prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4795: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ [ṣaṭ] pāramitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāśayataḥ samutsṛjati /
SA20bsa034_u:4796: na ca punastasya samutsargasya vipākenārthī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4798: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ parakāryasvakārya iva sarvaparakāryārthakriyāsu saṃdṛśyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4799: idaṃ bodhisattvasya pañcamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4804: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthe samaṃ taccittamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4806: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka iva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4807: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka eva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4808_1: viditvā bodhisattvo yā ekasya sattvasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāmiti dharmasamatānugatena
SA20bsa034_u:4810: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvārthakriyāsahagatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu smacitto viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:4818: pañcabhirākāraiḥ sattvā upakāriṇo bodhisattvasya pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4820: ātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ saṃyojayanti paraguṇādhānāya prayuktāro bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4821: anātheṣu duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvapratiśaraṇeṣu sattveṣu sānāthyaṃ kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4823: tathāgatābhāṣitañca dharmamukhena vā lekhayitvā vā dhārayanti tañca pūjayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4834: iha bodhisattva ādita eva sattveṣu hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4837: iti sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyaṃ yadyathā pūjāsevā 'pramāṇapaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:4841: pañcabhiḥ prayogairbodhisattvasya sarvasamyaksaṃprayoga saṃgraho veditavyaḥ katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4846: tatra bodhisattvo 'nurakṣaṇā prayogeṇa medhāṃ rakṣati yena sahajena jñānena dharmān laghuladhvevodgṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:4847: smṛtiṃ rakṣati yayā smṛtyā udgṛhītān dharmān dhārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4852: tatra bodhisattvasyānavadyaprayogo yaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvaviparītaścottaptaścāpramāṇaśca satataśca bodhipariṇāmitaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:4855: niyatipatitaprayogo niyatāyāṃ bhūmau niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4863: tadanyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ saha paritulanābhimānatā dharmaviparyāsābhimānatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:4866: te punareṣāmeva pañcānāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ viparyayeṇa veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4882: saddharmasya ca prakāśanā saddharmapratirūpakāṇāṃ ca pratikṣepaṇatā /
SA20bsa034_u:4883: daśasu sthāneṣu samāsato bodhisattvā vineyān sattvān samyageva vinayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4903: aparimitakālaṃ vyākurvanti na tu kālaniyama kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4910: punarekatyo bodhisattvo niyataṃ cittamutpādayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na punastāvatpratyudāvartayati yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4911: punarbodhisattvo vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvāṃ sattvārthacaryāṃ yathecchati yathārabhate tathaivābandhyāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:4916: tatra paścimaṃ niyatipātamārabhya tathāgatā niyatipatitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4917: pañcemāni sthānāni bodhisattvasyāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti yānyakṛtvā bodhisattvaḥ abhavyo bhavatyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
SA20bsa034_u:4929: daśeme dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ pradhānasammatā yān bodhisattvā agrato dhārayantyagryaprajñaptiṣu ca prajñapayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4933: vīryaṃ ca prajñā ca sarvapāramitānāṃ pradhānam /
SA20bsa034_u:4947: catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptivyavasthānāni yāniṃ bodhisattvā eva samyak prajñapayanti vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā vā /
SA20bsa034_u:4948: na tvanyaḥ kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā /
SA20bsa034_u:4951: tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4962: ] hetusatyaṃ phalasatyaṃ jñānasatyaṃ jñeyasatyaṃ agryasatyaṃ ca /

SA20bsa034_u:4980_1: saṃbhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ śrāvakayānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ

SA20bsa034_u:4992: eṣāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale /

SA20bsa034_u:5044: tadekatyāḥ sattvāḥ tasminneva saddharme deśyamāne virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūtpādayanti /

SA20bsa034_u:5069_0: tatra yacca dharmamahattvaṃ yacca cittotpādamahattvaṃ yaccādhimuktimahattvaṃ yaccādhyāśayamahattvaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:5069_1: yacca sambhāramahattvaṃ yacca kālamahattvamitīmāni ṣaṭmahattvāni hetubhūmāni samudāgama-mahattvasya /
SA20bsa034_u:5071: aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /
SA20bsa034_u:5073: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:5074: tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:5080: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /
SA20bsa034_u:5081: ke punaste bodhisattvā ya evaṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:5095: sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5097: sa eva punaḥ śuddhāśayo yāvanniṣṭhāgamanabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaparipakva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5105: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5106: ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5107: yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:5108: teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:5109: tadyathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dhīmānuttamadyutiḥ jinaputro jinādhāraḥ vijetā jināṅkuraḥ vikrāntaḥ paramāryaḥ sārthavāho mahāyaśaḥ kṛpālurmahāpuṇyaḥ īśvaro dhārmikaśceti /
SA20bsa034_u:5110: teṣāṃ punardaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantānāṃ bodhisattvānāmaprameyāḥ prayātmagatāḥ saṃjñāprāptayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5111: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ bodhisattvā vartante na ca bodhisattvaśikṣāsu samyak pratipadyante te bodhisattvapratirūpakā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5113: bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ vartante samyak [ca ye] bodhisattvaśikṣāṣu śikṣante te bhūtā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5121: pañcemāni bhūtasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato [bodhisattvo] bodhisattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:5123: anukampā priyavāditā vairyaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5124: ime punaḥ pañca dharmāḥ pañca parivartena veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5129: pratipattigataśca svabhāvato 'nukampāyāḥ yadāśayo bhavati bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tadeva yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ kāyena vācā upasaṃharati /

SA20bsa034_u:6055: te tayā [ca] dharmadeśanayā [tayā] ca visabhāgasamudācāratayā tebhyo doṣebhyastenopāyakauśalyena vinivartante /
SA20bsa034_u:6059: tena ca vipākena yathoktaṃ svaparārthapaṭale karma karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6062: yā bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvaddaśamādvihārādupapattirvarṇitā sā 'syādhipattyopapattirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6063: jambūdvīpeśvaratvamupādāya yāvanmaheśvaratvādakaniṣṭhānatikramya sarvopapattyāyatanapraviṣṭaṃ yatra paramavihāraprāptā eva bodhisattvā upapadyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6066: yasyāmupapattau paripūrṇabodhisambhārī bodhisattvaḥ purohitakule vā rājakule vā upapadyānuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6069: ye kecid bodhisattvā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu śubhāsu bhadrāsu kalyāṇāsu upapattiṣūpapannā upapatsyante upapadyante ca sarve te āsveva pañcasu /
SA20bsa034_u:6070: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ sthāpayitvā bālabhūmyupapattīḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6071: tathā hi vijñairbodhisattvaiḥ upapattaya etāḥ pañcābhipretāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6077: tatra sarvāsu vihāragatāsu bodhisattvacaryāsu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ samyaktvaparigraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6084: prathama eva cittotpāde bodhisattvena sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ kalatrabhāvena parigṛhītaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6085: eṣāṃ mayā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ sarvākārahitasukhopasaṃhāraḥ karaṇīya iti /
SA20bsa034_u:6089: sa ca tasminparigrahe parigrahānurūpayā kriyayā bodhisattvānurūpayā pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6100: kālena ca kālaṃ vaiśeṣikeṇa lābhena priyavāditayā copavatsayati na caiṣu dāsadāsīsaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6102: rājyajane punā rājabhūto bodhisattvaḥ adaṇḍenāśastreṇa rājyaṃ kārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6113: sa dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ samyak pariṣadaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6117: sarvasmiṃśca parigrahe samacitto bhavati na pakṣapatitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6118: na ca teṣāmantike dharmamātsaryaṃ karoti na cācāryamuṣṭim /
SA20bsa034_u:6120: kuśalakāmatayā tu svayaṃ kurvatāṃ na nivārayati teṣāmeva-puṇyasambhāropacayanimittam kālaṃ ca prāpya svayamevateṣāmupasthānaparicaryākartā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6125: gambhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya kālena kālaṃ saṃprakāśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6127: ātmanaścāntikāt teṣāmarthe āmiṣahetoradhikena vyāpāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6130: vyādhitāṃścaitāṃ vimanaskaṃ vā sarvathā nābhyupekṣate vyādhipraśamāya daurmanasyāpagamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:6132: kālena ca kālaṃ teṣāṃ khedamanupraviśya yuktarūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6135: taiśca saha tulyavṛttasamācāro bhavatyadhiko vā [na] nyūnaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6145: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ kālaṃ pariṣadupādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6148: tatra ye mṛduke paripāke vyavasthitāḥ sattvāste bodhisattvasya dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante cireṇa kālena viśuiddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:6150: ye punarmadhye paripāke vyavasthitāste 'dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante na cireṇa viśuddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:6151: ye punaḥ sattvā adhimātre paripāke vyavasthitāste bodhisattvasya caramamupādānamityucyante tasminneva janmani viśuddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:6153: yena parigraheṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ sattvān parigṛhītavantaḥ parigrahīṣyanti parigṛhṇanti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:6157_0: vyatikramavyavasthiteṣu sattveṣu yudi vā bādhanaṃ yadi vā 'dhyupekṣaṇā bodhisattvasya
SA20bsa034_u:6157_1: saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ kaṭukena ca prayogeṇa sattve samudācāraḥ svasya cāśayasya
SA20bsa034_u:6158: alpake ca deyadharme saṃvidyamāne bahūnāṃ yācakānāṃ sammukhībhāvo yācanāya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6159: ekātmakasya cāsya bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣu vicitreṣūtpanneṣu sahāyībhāvayācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6162: mūḍhaśaṭhakhaṭhuṃkeṣu sattveṣu dharmasya deśanā vādhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6163: saṃsāre ca nityakālaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ saṃsārāparityāgaśca saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6165_0: aviśuddhe cādhyāṣaye parairagrasya parama-priyasya vastuno yācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ
SA20bsa034_u:6165_1: nānādhibhinnamatānāṃ nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñaptikā adhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6166: ātyantikaścāpramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kleśāśca sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prahātavya iti saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6167: evaṃ saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptena bodhisattve kvacidgurulāghavaṃ lakṣayitvā tathaiva prayoktavyam kvacitpudgalapravicayaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6175: evaṃ samyak pratipakṣakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptisammukhībhāve 'pi na viṣīdati samyakcātmānaṃ pariharati /
SA20bsa034_u:6176: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne parigrahapaṭalaṃ dvitīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6179: eṣu yathāvarṇiteṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣvanugatāḥ sapta bhūmayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6196: tāthāgatasya punarvihārasya bhūmeśca paścānnirdeśo bhaviṣyati buddhadharmapratiṣṭhā paṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:6197: tatra bodhisattvaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmeḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimanupraviśan katham apāyānsamatikrāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:6198_0: iha bodhisattvo laukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityādhimukticaryābhūmau susambhṛtabodhi
SA20bsa034_u:6199: sa bhāvanānvayāt tadrūpaṃ sattveṣvanukampāśayaṃ karuṇāśayaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6201: yadi me eṣveva sannivasato 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudāgacchati tathāpyahamutsahāmīti sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6204: tasya tathā paribhāvitaṃ tallaukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:6206: acireṇa tasya prahāṇādāśrayo 'sya bodhisattvasya parivartate pāpakasyāpāyikasya karmaṇo 'tyantamakaraṇatāyai apāyāgamanatāyai (Dutt 254) ca /
SA20bsa034_u:6210: ye ca te daśadharmā vihārapaṭale nirdiṣṭā /
SA20bsa034_u:6211: śraddhādayo vihārapariśodhanāḥ ta ihāpi bhūmiviśodhanā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6215: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ bhūmiviśodhanānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipakṣabhūtā dharmāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6218: sarveṇa sarvamanārambhacittotpādanā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāsamādānam ayaṃ śraddhāvipakṣo dharmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6236: śāstari kāṃkṣā vimatirvicikitsā tathāgatapūjopa sthānatāyāḥ vipakṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6253: dhṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca samyak prayogādaparihīyamānaḥ kuśalaiśca dharmairvivardhamānaḥ pratipattipūjayā lābhasatkārapūjayā ca tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6256: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne tṛtīyaṃ bhūmipaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:6259: adhimukticaryābhūmimupādāya sarvāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataścatasraścaryā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6263: upāyakauśalyapāramitā ca praṇidhānapāramitā ca balapāramitā ca jñānapāramitā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:6282: dānādayo dharmāḥ parameṇa kālena samudāgatāḥ paramayā svabhāvaviśuddhyā viśuddhāḥ paramañca phalamanuprayacchanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6287: tatra mātsaryaṃ duścaritaṃ sattveṣu vairotpīḍanatā kausīdyaṃ vikṣepo mandamomuhatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:6289: eṣāṃ [ṣaṇṇāṃ] dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ pāramitā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6293: ihādita eva bhoganirapekṣo bodhisattvaḥ tyaktvā āgārikān kāmān śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6296: samādānataśca kṣāntitaśca viśuddhiśīlo niścalena nirantareṇa kuśalapakṣaprayogeṇa prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6298: sa tathā samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ jñeyaṃ jānāti dṛśyaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6301: iha bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭe dharme etān dānādīn kuśalāndharmān samādāya vartamānasya tannidānamāyatyāṃ bāhyataśca bhogasampatpratilambho bhavati dānakṛtaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6306: sahajā cakuśalamūlaprayoge akhedatā paravyatikramasahiṣṇutā ca paropatāpapriyatā /
SA20bsa034_u:6310: sahajā ca mandarajaskasya svacittavaśitā cittakarmaṇyatā sarvārtheṣu kṣiprābhijñatāyai /
SA20bsa034_u:6314: iyaṃ pañcamī sampat itīdaṃ phalavipākakṛtamanyadanukramavyavasthānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6315: tatra catasṛbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ [saha]sambhāreṇa svabhāvena parivāreṇa rakṣayā ca paripūrṇā bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlaṃ śikṣā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6326: etāni ca catvāri kṛtyāni bodhisattvāḥ ābhiścatasṛbhiścaryābhiryathākramaṃ kurvantyanutiṣṭhanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6328: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne caturthaṃ caryāpaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:6331: tatra tathāgatavihāramārabhya tāthāgatīñca niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiṃ bhagavatāṃ catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6332_1: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣāṇi mahāṃkaruṇā
SA20bsa034_u:6336: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe /
SA20bsa034_u:6349: ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam /
SA20bsa034_u:6352: ślakṣṇatvāt tvace rajo malasya kāye nāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6365: prabhūtatvāj jihvāyāḥ mukhājjihavāṃ nirṇāmya sarvamukhamaṇḍalamavacchādayati yāvantakaṃ kleśaparyantam /
SA20bsa034_u:6373: ūrṇā cāsya bhrūvormadhye jātā śvetā śaṃkhanibhā pradakṣiṇāvartā /
SA20bsa034_u:6391: dve pārśve dve kakṣe dvau stanauabhisamasya ṣaḍanuvyañjane bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6393: ityetyāni adhaḥ kāyagatāni grīvāyāma ūrdhvaṃ sthāpayitvā ṣaṣṭiranuvyañjanāni bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6405: ityetāni grīvāyāḥ ūrdhvaṃ kāye viṃśatiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6406: pūrvakāni ca ṣaṣṭiḥ paścimakāni ca viṃśatirekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya aśītiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6407: ityetāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni [bhadrāṇi] śuddhāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo bodhisattvo vipākataḥ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6410: hīnaistu taiḥ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaḥ samanvāgato bhavati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimupādāya /
SA20bsa034_u:6411: sarvaścāviśeṣeṇa bodhisambhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ nirvartako bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6423_0: apyeva te tasya pāpakasya karmaṇo vipakṣabhūtasya vicitrasya yatprātipakṣikaṃ vicitraṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6423_1: kuśalaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakaṃ karma tasyedaṃ vicitraphalānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā tasya
SA20bsa034_u:6427: mātāpitrorupasthānena vicitreṇa vicitrayā ca sattvopadravārakṣayā āgamana-gamanādiparispandamupādāya cakrāṅkapādatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6429: yaiśca tribhiḥ karmabhiretāni trīṇi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni taireva sarvaiḥ samastairāyatapādapārṣṇitvaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6430: tatra trayāṇāmapi lakṣaṇānāṃ saṃniśrayatvāt caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhirgurūn saṃgṛhya jālapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6432: kuśaladharmāsaṃtuṣṭyā uttarottarān kuśalāndharmānvardha yitvā ucchaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6433: yathāvaddharmānudgṛhya paryavāpya pareṣāṃ ca deśayitvā dautyañca samyak pareṣāṃ kṛtvā aiṇeyajaṅghatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6435: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6436: parairnirvāsitān sattvān dharmeṇa samena saṃhṛtya hrīmānapatrāpī vastrapradaśca koṣagatavastiguhyatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6437: kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ saṃvṛtātmā pratigraha-bhojane ca mātrajñaḥ glāneṣu bhaiṣajyapradaḥ viṣame karmaṇi pratigraha-paribhogavaiṣamye cāpravṛttatvāt (Dutt 262)
SA20bsa034_u:6439: yenaiva ca karmaṇā utsaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate tenaivordhvaṅgaromatām /
SA20bsa034_u:6440_0: svayaṃ kuśalamīmāṃsakaḥ paṇḍitavijña-sevī sūkṣmārthacintakaḥ gurūṇāṃ sthānaśodhakaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:6442: yenaiva ca karmaṇā ekaikaromatoktā tenaiva sūkṣmaślakṣṇatvacatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6443: prabhūtenotsadena viśadenānnapānena mahājanakāyaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saptotsadakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6446: ahitāñca sattvānā nivārayitā tāḍitā hitāhite ca sanniyojayitā siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatāṃ pratilabhate siṃhavatsattvārtheṣu parākramaśīlatvāt /
SA20bsa034_u:6447: anenaiva ca karmaṇā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā citāntarāṃśatā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6448: yenaiva ca karmaṇā dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ pratilabhate tenaiva bṛhadṛjugātratāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6449: mitrabhedakarīṃ piśunāṃ vācaṃ prahāya bhinnānāñca sattvānāṃ sāmagrīṃ kṛtvā catvāriṃśad dantatāṃ samāviraladantatāñca pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6450: kāmāvacarīṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayitvā dharmārthacintakaḥ suśukladantatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6451: arthimyaḥ sattvebhyo yathābhipretaṃ dhanaṃ samyagvisṛjya siṃhahanutāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6452: svasutavat-sattvānsaṃrakṣya śrāddhaścānukampakaśca bhaiṣajyapradaśca [prasannaśca] rasarasāgratāṃ pratilabhate dharmarasānupradānāddharmarasāsvādanāt pranaṣṭarasaviśodhanācca /
SA20bsa034_u:6453_0: pañca śikṣāpadāni prāṇātipātaviratyādīni svayañca samādāya saṃrakṣya parāṃśca teṣveva
SA20bsa034_u:6454: satyavāditayā priyavāditayā kāladharmavāditayā ca brahmasvaratāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6455: kṛtsnaṃ jaganmaitreṇa cetasā 'nukampya mātṛvatpitṛvadabhinīlanetratāṃ gopakṣmanetratāñca pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6456: guṇavatāṃ tu bhūtasya varṇasya hartāṃ varṇavādī bhruvormadhye ūrṇāṃ pratilabhate śvetāṃ śaṃkhanibhāṃ pradakṣiṇāvartām /
SA20bsa034_u:6457: (Dutt 263) sarveṣu ca dvātriṃśatsu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvaviśeṣeṇa śīlaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratilambhāya veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6459: na hi śīlavipanno bodhisattvo manuṣyatvameva tāvadāsādayet kutaḥ punarmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:6460: tatroṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anava lokitamūrdhatā caikaṃ mahāpuruṣakṣaṇaṃ veditavye tadvyatirekeṇānupalambhāt /
SA20bsa034_u:6464: nipuṇakāritayā cakracaraṇatā ucchaṅgacaraṇatā jālapāṇipādatā sūkṣmatvacatā citāntarāṃśatā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā vṛhadṛjugātratā prabhūtatanujihvatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6465: nityakāritayā dīrghāṅga litvaṃ āyatapādapārṣṇitā anavanatakāyatā nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā aviraladantatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6469: prāmodyaprītiprabhāsvareṇa cittena kuśalasamācārād vyāma-prabhatā ca kāñcanasannibhatvacatā śukladantatā ūrṇā ca śvetā nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6471: bodhāya kuśalamūlapariṇamanādūrdhvāṅga-romatā catvāriṃśatsamadantatā rasarasāgratā uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6472: kuśale atṛptālīnaprayogāt siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatā siṃhahanutā ca nirvartaṃte /

SA20bsa034_u:6475: evamanayā caturākārayā sukṛtakarmāntatayā bodhisattvānāmeṣāṃ dvātriṃśatāṃ-mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānāṃ pratilambho viśuddhiśca bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6480: veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6481: tatra rūpitvādeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ hīnamadhyottamaiśca sattvaiḥ sūpalakṣyatvāt satsu sarveṣveva buddhadharmeṣu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvetānyeva mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpitāni /
SA20bsa034_u:6483: tatra samāsataḥ sarvasattveṣu puṇyasadṛśena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaiko romakūpo nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6487: tataḥ śataguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6490: yāvānūrṇā-praviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ tataḥ śatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anavalokitamūrdhatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6492: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāsaṃgṛhīto 'nyo dharmaśaṃkhyo nāma nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6493: yena tathāgata ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ anantāparyantān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6496: teṣāṃ punarlakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇeprameyatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6499: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne pañcamaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:6507: savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato 'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6509: nirvāṇe pariṇāme saṃprakhyāne ca sarvālambaneṣu yā vaśavartitā /
SA20bsa034_u:6514: pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣyadauṣṭhulyāpagamātsarvatra ca jñeye jñānasyānāvaraṇāt jñānavaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānaviśuddhirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6517: ityetāni daśa tathāgatabalāni yuthā daśabalasūtre nirdeśato vistareṇa veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:6518: [tatra] yatkiñcidanena bhāṣitaṃ lapitamudāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tattathā avitatheti tasmāttathāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6519: tatra phalasya śubhāśabhasya yo bhūtapravṛttaḥ aviṣamo hetuḥ tadasya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā niśrayo 'bhinirvartakaṃ ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6523: eṣāñca sarvajñānādīnāṃ padānāṃ pūrvavadvyākaraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ tadyathā paramabodhipaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:6530: svayamadhigamya pareṣāmapyanukampayā vistareṇa prakāśanād brāhmacakraṃ pravartayatītyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6532: tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapi /
SA20bsa034_u:6534: evaṃ pāraṃparyeṇa brahmā preritaṃ sarvasattvanikāye bhramati /
SA20bsa034_u:6538: teṣām uttānā vivṛtā prajñaptā prakāśitā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6541: tasya cābhyupāyasya sarvajanyatāyo [yaḥ] kaścidākāṃkṣati devabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] sarveṇa tena mamaivāntikāllabhya eṣo 'bhyupāya iti /
SA20bsa034_u:6544: sarva[ku]vaidyapratijñā pratikṣepaṇavat svayaṃ ca niyataṃ vyādhipraśamanapratijñānavatpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ naditaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6546: yāni naiva kṛtāni na niruddhāni nāpi karoti api tu kariṣyatyāyatyāṃ /
SA20bsa034_u:6548: yāni punaḥ karmāṇi naiva kṛtāni na niruddhānyapi tu kartumeva praṇihito vyavasitaḥ tāni pratyutpannānītyucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6549: tāni punaḥprakārabhedena trīṇi kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma /
SA20bsa034_u:6554: yacca sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā vastvādhiṣṭhāya kriyante tatteṣāṃ vastu ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6558: tadetadabhisamasya sarvakālaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvāvasthāprayogaṃ sarvadeśaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvanidānaṃ sarvādīnavānuśaṃsañca sarvākāraṃ tathāgatānāṃ karmajñānaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6562: dhyānavimokṣaiḥ karmaṇyacetasaścetovaśiprāptasya yathepsitasyārthasya samṛddhaye yā tasya tadanurūpasya samādheḥ samāpadyanatā tā samādhisamāpattirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6565: yathā samāhite citte sarvo brahmalokaudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo babhūva /
SA20bsa034_u:6568: evaṃ hi tathāgato yaṃ yamevārthaṃ prasādhayitukāmo lokasādhāraṇaṃ [asādhāraṇaṃ vā] sa tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya laghuladhveva prasādhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6569: tatradhyānavimokṣābhyāṃ cittavaśitayā ca cittādhīna-sarvepsitārthasamṛddhiḥ etāvacca sarvadhyāyīnāṃ karaṇīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6571: taccaitad dhyāyikaraṇīyaṃ [sarvākāraṃ] tathāgatānāṃ tasmād dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattaya evocyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6578: teṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ vicitrāṇāmabhinirhṛtānāṃ nāmasaṃketena anurūpeṇa yathāyogaṃ vyavasthitirvyavasthānāmityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6579: eṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ pratilabdhānāmuttari yā bhāvanā-paripūrirnikāmalābhitā 'kṛcchreṇānavarakalābhitā saiṣāṃ viśuddhirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6580: tatra yathā caiṣāmaprāptiryathā ca prāptiḥ teṣu ca yā ca hīnatā yā ca praṇītatā yaccaiṣāṃ nāma yā cotkarṣaparyantatā tat sarvaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6582: yathā paripākasamudāgamataḥ śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratā indriya-parāparatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6583: paraśraddhāpūrvā dharmavicāraṇā-pūrvā ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrā ruciḥ pratyavagamaḥ nānādhimuktikatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6585: śrāvakapratyekabuddha-tathāgatagotrāṇāṃ rāgādicaritaprabhedanayena ca yāvadaśīti sattvacaritasahasrāṇi nānādhātukatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6586: teṣāmevāvatāra-mukhānurūpā pratipat tadyathā rāgacaritānāmaśubhā vistareṇa tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvatragāminī pratipadityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6592_0: vicitreṣu sattvanikāyeṣu tadyathā pūrveṣu dakṣiṇeṣu uttareṣu paścimeṣu nānā nāmasaṃketavyavasthānabhinneṣu
SA20bsa034_u:6604: āhvānāya saṃketaḥ kṣatriyādayo varṇā mātāpitaraṃ bhojanapānavidhiḥ sampattivipattiḥ āryurvaicitryañca /
SA20bsa034_u:6605: tathā hi loke etānyaṣṭau vyavahārapadāni upaniśritya ṣaṭ caritāni pareṣāmātmano vyapadiśanto vyapadiśanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6608: brāhmaṇo vaiśyaḥ śūdro 'hamayaṃ vā ayaṃ me pitā 'sya va /

SA20bsa034_u:6613: evaṃrūpe 'haṃ vayasi vyavasthito nave vā madhye vā vṛddhe vā /
SA20bsa034_u:6630: tadyathā kṛṣṇasyakutapasya nirbhāsaḥ andhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6632: ye punardvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ jyotiḥ parāyaṇāsteṣāmayamevaṃrūpo manomayo 'ntarābhavo nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6633: tadyathā jyotsnayā rātryā vārāṇaseyakasya vā sampannasya vastrasya /
SA20bsa034_u:6639: sa samutthānayā śīlavipattyā kāyavāṅma noduścaritena samanvāgatā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6641: sarvāpavādikayā tanmatavipakṣāvasthitāryapavādikayā ca mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ āryāṇāmapavādakā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6653: adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca tayā tatra yānaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6658: iti yena copapadyante upapannāśca yadupabhuñjate tadupabhogācca punaryadanyat svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkhāntaramabhinirvartayanti tadetadābhiḥ saṃjñābhiḥ paridīpitam /
SA20bsa034_u:6663: sarvāsravāṇāmaśeṣānuśayaprahāṇādyattat prātipakṣikamanāsravaṃ cittamanāśravā prajñāparamādhiprajñasaṃgṛhītā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayādanāsravā cetovimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6664_0: tāṃ punaścetovimuktiṃ [prajñāvimukti] tasminneva carame bhave pratyātmaṃ ṣaṣṭhābhijñayā
SA20bsa034_u:6666: tasmād dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya (Dutt 271)
SA20bsa034_u:6668: kṣīṇāṃ me jātirityevamādīnāṃ padānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6680: ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ samāsato daśa tathāgatabalāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:6685: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ na tu śraddhābalaṃ vā tadanyadvā balamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6699: iyameṣāṃ samatā vihāraviśeṣastu tathāgatānāmanyonyaṃ bhavedanyena balavihāreṇa anyastathāgatastadvahulavihārī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6701: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ tathāgataḥ kena kiṃ karmaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6702: sthānāsthānajñānabalena tathāgataḥ hetuñca hetutaḥ phalañca phalato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6705: karmasvakatājñānabalena tathāgataḥ svayaṃkṛta-phalopabhogatāñca karmaṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6709: indriyaparāparajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sattvānāmindriyamṛdumadhyādhimātratāñca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6714: nānādhātujñānabalena tathāgato hīnamadhyepraṇotadhātukatāśca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6715: yathendriyān yathāṣayān yathānuśayāṃśca sattvāṃsteṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādakriyayā samyagyathāyogaṃ saṃniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6716: tatra yathā tathāgatāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādamanuprayacchanti tathāśrāvakabhūmau sarveṇa sarvaṃ nirantaramākhyātamuttānaṃ vivṛtaṃ prajñaptaṃ prakāśitam /
SA20bsa034_u:6717: kathañca punastathāgatā bodhisattvamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ samādhisambhāraparigrahe 'vasthitañcittasthitikāmaṃ cittasthitaye 'vavadanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6718: iha tathāgato bodhisattvāsataṃ samādhisambhāragurukamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ tatprathamataḥ evamavavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:6719: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra praviviktaśayanāsanagata ekākī advitīyo yatte mātāpitṛbhyāṃ nāma vyavasthāpitamācāryopādhyāyābhyāṃ vā tadeva nāmādhyātmaṃ manasikuru /
SA20bsa034_u:6720: evañca punarmanasikuru-asti me [sa] kaścitṣaḍāyatanavinirmukto dharmaḥ svabhāvena pariniṣpannaḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6722: saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ upacāraḥ pravartate sa tvamevaṃ yoniśo manasikurvaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ nopalapsyase /
SA20bsa034_u:6725: yadā ca te kulaputra tasmin svanāmni āgantukasaṃjñā utpānna bhavati pratilabdhā sa tvaṃ yā te cakṣuṣi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥ-prajñaptistāmadhyātmaṃ yoniśomanasikuru /
SA20bsa034_u:6732: tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6733: yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6735: na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ cakṣuḥprajñaptiṃ vinā kasyacit cakṣurbuddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6737: yena nāmnā 'bhilapyate na tatra punastadapekṣā cakṣurityevaṃ buddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6738: nānyatra prakṛtyaivāśruto 'parikalpita-nāmakānāmapi tasmin vastuni cakṣuriti buddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6739: na ca punaḥ pravartamānā upalabhyate tasmādidamapi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥprajñaptiḥ āgantuke dharme saṃjñā āgantukī /
SA20bsa034_u:6742: evaṃ [te] svātmani yā saṃjñā [avasthā] tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6743: vistareṇa yāvatsarvadharmeṣu yā saṃjñā tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6744_0: sa tvamevaṃ sarvajñeya-suvicāritayā buddhyā evaṃ te sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñayā
SA20bsa034_u:6746: sa tvaṃ sacedaśubhāṃ manasikaroṣi enaṃ manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi /

SA20bsa034_u:6756: sarvatrāgaminī pratipat jñānabalena tathāgataḥ sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīmanairyāṇikīṃ ca pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6758: pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena tathāgataḥ pūrvānte itivṛttakāṃśca jātakāṃśca smṛtvā cittasaṃvegāya cittaprasādāya vineyānāṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6762: āsravakṣayajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sve ca vimokṣe niṣkāṃkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6766: sahābhisaṃbodhādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhestathāgataḥ sarvāṇyeva daśa balāni sakṛtpratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6768: abhisaṃbuddhamātra eva tathāgato dharmāṇāṃ samyageva hetuphalavyavasthānaṃ sthānāsthānajñāgabalena vyavalokayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6769: vyavalokya kāmadhātāveva sabhāge dhātāviṣṭaphala-viśeṣārthikānāṃ karmasvakatā-jñānabalenākuśalakarmaparivarjanāṃ kuśalakarmasamudācāratāñca vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:6777_1: pratipadaṃ vyapadiśati sarvakleśaprahāṇāya pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena cyutyupapattijñānabalena ca /
SA20bsa034_u:6778: tata evaṃ samyak prayuktaḥ śamathopastabdho aprahīṇakleśasamudācārayogākṛte kṛtābhimānināmabhimānaṃ tyājayati āsravakṣayajñānabalena /
SA20bsa034_u:6781: iha tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhibhisaṃbudhya tatprathamataḥ sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ sammukhīkṛtya pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu paramaṃ dharmasthitijñānaṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6782: tacca dharmasthitijñānaṃ niḥśritya karmasvakatājñānabalena gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokayati yena yena karmaṇā vicitreṇa teṣāṃ gṛhipakṣāśritānāṃ samudāgamo 'bhūdbhaviṣyati vidyate [ca] /
SA20bsa034_u:6784: kimastyasmin kaścid pravrajitapakṣe duḥkhānniḥsṛto duḥkhān niḥsaraṇāya ca mārgasya deśayitā /
SA20bsa034_u:6786: sa nāstīti avagamya nisrāṇamaśaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ lokamavekṣya mahākaruṇāmupādāya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6788: santi sattvā loke jātā [loke] vṛddhā mṛdvindriyā api madhyendriyā api tīkṣṇendriyā apīti /

SA20bsa034_u:6794: tataḥ karmasvakajñānabalena yeṣu pratītatyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu sattvasaṃjñātaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vicārayati /

SA20bsa034_u:6796: dharmadhātuṃ [sattvadhātuṃ] ca yathāvadvyavacārayitvā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena tāneva sattvān duḥkhavimokṣāya samyak tribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:6797: avavadan pūrvaṃvadananukrameṇāvaśiṣṭairvalairindriyādīni jñātvā mārge cāvatārayitvā tān sattvān duḥkhādvimocayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6800: tatra sthānāsthānajñānavalasya karmasvakajñānabalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6801: yatkuśalākuśalasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate idaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalāt /
SA20bsa034_u:6802: yatpunarya eva kuśalākuśalaṃ karma karoti sa eva tadiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6804: yattāvadya eva dhyānavimokṣādīnāṃ samāpattyā tasyaiva te bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6833: prakṛtisthaṃ bījaṃ pūrvābhyāsasamutthitaṃ bījaṃ viśodhyaṃ bījam /
SA20bsa034_u:6844: yatpunaḥ pravibhajya vyavahārapadānugataṃ pūrvavat ṣaḍvidhaṃ caritaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6856: tatra catvāryetāni sthānāni tathāgataiḥ pariṣadi pratijñātavyāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6861: vimokṣakāmānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ duḥkhasamatikramāya nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6863: tasyaiva ca mārgasya prāptivibandhabhūtā ye āntarāyikā dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6866_0: ataḥ pratijñāviguṇāṃ dvayoḥ pūrvayoḥ sthānayoḥ kāyavāṅmanaśceṣṭāṃ pratijñāviguṇāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6866_1: ca dvayoḥ paścimayoḥ sthānayoḥ pūrvāparavirodhatāmayuktipatitāñcāpareṣāṃ divyadṛśāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6866_3: nimittabhūtāmasamanupaśyan yenaitāni sthānāni viśārado 'līnacitto nirāśaṅko nirbhīḥ pratijānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6867: etāvacca śāstrā pratijñātavyam yaduta paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ parahitapratipattiśca /
SA20bsa034_u:6868: tatra pūrvakābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sthānābhyāṃ paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6875: yo vā me bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca nairyāṇiko mārgo deśita iti vistaraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6879: dīrgharātraṃ tathāgata evaṃ kāmaḥ kaccinmayā sudeśite dharme vineyāḥ pratipattau yathāvadavatiṣṭeranniti /
SA20bsa034_u:6880: tasya ca dīrgharātraṃ tatkāmasya dharmasvāmino gaṇaparikarṣakasya tasyāḥ prārthitāyāḥ sampattibhyāmasaṃkleśasribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ samāsataḥ prabhāvyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6887: tṛtīyā punaḥ pariṣadyāsyāṃ tadekatyāḥ samyak pratipadyante tadekatyā mithyā pratipadyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6890: etattathāgatasya tribhirarakṣyaiḥ paridīpitam yadapi tadarthato 'pi kiñcidavyākṛtaṃ kukṛtamātrakaṃ bhavati kadācitkarhicitsmṛtipramoṣāt /
SA20bsa034_u:6896: api tu niṣṭhuraṃ pratipadyate nāsya teṣvanurakṣā utpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6897: mā haiva me śrāvakāḥ saṃvāsānvayādapariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥ-samudācāratāṃ viditvā tena vastunā 'nāttamanaskā anabhirāddhyāścodayiṣyanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6900: tatra tathāgatānāṃ mahākaruṇā sarvākārā yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭā pūjāsevāpramāṇapaṭale veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6902: tatra tathāgatasyānuṣṭeyaṃ yacca bhavati [yatra ca bhavati] yathā ca bhavati yadā ca bhavati tatra tasya tathā tadā samyaganuṣṭhānādiyaṃ tathāgatasyāsammoṣadharmatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6903: iti yā ca tatra tathāgatasya sarvakṛtyeṣu sarvadeśeṣu sarvakṛtyopāyeṣu sarvakāleṣu smṛtyasaṃpramoṣatā sadopasthitasmṛtitā /
SA20bsa034_u:6905: tatra yā tathāgatasya spandite vā prekṣite vā kathite vā vihāre vā kleśasadbhāvasadṛśaṃ ceṣṭā 'samudācāra-pracāratā /
SA20bsa034_u:6907: arhatāṃ punaḥ prahīṇakleśānāmapi kleśasadbhāvasadṛśī ceṣṭā spandita-prekṣita-kathita-vihṛteṣu bhavatyeva /
SA20bsa034_u:6915: tatra yacca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ yacca varajñānaṃ tadaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sarvākāravarajñānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6917: tatra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānyanena bodhisattvabhūtena carame bhave supariśuddhāni pratilabdhāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6918_0: yadā tu bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdati suparipūrṇa-bodhisaṃbhāramārgo bodhisattvaḥ paścime bhave
SA20bsa034_u:6918_2: nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate śaikṣyabhūtasya bodhisattvasya vajropamasamādhi-saṃgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:6919: tasyānantaraṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe pariśiṣṭānāṃ daśabalādīnāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāra-varajñāna-paryavasānānāṃ suviśuddhatāṃ niruttaratāṃ sakṛtpratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6920: teṣāñca lābhāt sarvasmin jñeye 'saktamanāvaraṇaṃ suviśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate ābhogamātra-pratibaddham /
SA20bsa034_u:6924: sāragatasya ca jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyasya niravaśeṣaṃ prahāṇādasyāśrayaḥ parivṛtto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6926: anyāḥ sarvāḥ paramavihārāvasānā bodhisattvānāmāśrayaparivṛttayaḥ sottarā eva veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6927: tatra niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya ca bodhisattvasya [tathāgatasya ca kathaṃ jñānaviśeṣo 'vagantavyo jñānāntaram /
SA20bsa034_u:6928: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya] pelavapaṭāntaritaṃ yathācakṣuṣmato rūpadarśanam /
SA20bsa034_u:6929: evaṃ tasya sarvasmin jñeye jñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6932: tadyathā sarvākāraraṃga-paripūrṇaṃ citrakarma paścimayā suviśuddhayā raṃgalekhayā 'pariśodhitam /
SA20bsa034_u:6938: tadyathā cakṣuṣmata ārādrūpadarśanam evaṃ evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā āsanne evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:6939: yathā mṛdutaimirikasya rūpadarśanam evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā suviśuddha-cakṣuṣaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:6940: yathā garbhagatasyātmabhāva evaṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmisthito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6942: yathārhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya cittapracārastathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6943: yathā tasyaiva prativibuddhasya cittapracāra evaṃ tathāgatasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6944: tadyathā pradīpasyāviśuddhasya svabhāvaḥ tathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6945: yathā suviśuddhasya pradīpasya svabhāvaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6947: evamabhisaṃbuddho bodhistathāgato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6954: ādita eva cittaprasādakārakamahāpuruṣa[bhāva]saṃpratyayajananā prathamaṃ tathā[gata]kṛtyaṃ tacca lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaiḥ sampādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6958: yattathāgato daśabhirtāthāgatabalaiḥ sampādayati tathā hi tathāgato daśabhiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairvalaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthasampādanaṃ prati samartho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6959: ye cainaṃ tathāgatabalānyārabhya praśnaṃ pṛcchanti yathā yāni tathāgatena jñātāni dṛṣṭāni viditāni vijñātāni tathā tāni tathāgatasteṣāṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:6961: yattathāgato vaiśāradyaiḥ sampādayati tathāgatājñāyāṃ sthiteṣvasyiteṣu ca vineyeṣvasaṃkliṣṭacittatā pañcamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6962: yattathāgataḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ sampādayati yathāvādi tathākāritā ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6963: yattathāgataḥ arakṣyaiḥ sampādayati buddhacakṣuṣā rātrindivaṃ sarvalokavyavalokanā saptamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6966: yattathāgato 'sammoṣadharmatayā sampādayati tathāgatasyācāravihārasya yathāvadanuvartanā adhitiṣṭhanā navamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6967_0: yattathāgato vāsanāsamuddhātena sampādayati ye dharmā anarthopasaṃhitā ye ca naivārthopasaṃhitānānārthopasaṃhitāstānabhinirvarjya
SA20bsa034_u:6967_1: ye ca dharmā arthopasaṃhitāsteṣāṃ samākhyānaṃ vivaraṇā uttānīkarme daśamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6968: yattathāgataḥ sarvākāravarajñānena sampādayati evaṃ hi tathāgato 'nenāveṇikena catvāriṃśaduttareṇa buddhadharmaśatena daśatathāgata kṛtyāni kurvan sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6969: vistaravibhāgataḥ punarasyaiva buddhakāryasya na sukarāsaṃkhyāṃ kartuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi /
SA20bsa034_u:6970: ayaṃ sa tathāgato vihārastathāgatī bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6972_0: etāmāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya yasyāḥ spṛhayamāṇarūpā bodhisattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāsu
SA20bsa034_u:6972_1: śikṣante adhigamyāpi ca tāṃ pratiṣṭhāmetāmevāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6975: sarve caite buddhadharmā atyarthaṃ parārthakriyānukūlāḥ parārthakriyāprabhāvitāśca tathāgatānām /
SA20bsa034_u:6978: santi ca te buddhadharmā ye sarveṇa sarvaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu nopalabhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6981: tathāgatasya tu sarve copalabhyante sarvākāraparipūrṇāścātikrāntatarāśca praṇītatarāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:6986: sarvabodhisattva-śikṣāmārgasya śikṣāmārgaphalasya ca tarvākārasya nirdeśāya adhiṣṭhānabhūtam sā khalviyaṃ bodhisattvabhūmirbodhisattvapiṭakamātṛketyapyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6990_0: yaḥ kaścit sadevamānuṣā[surā]llokāddevabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
SA20bsa034_u:6990_2: bhāvanākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣāṃ vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyatyantato lekhayitvā
SA20bsa034_u:6991_0: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya
SA20bsa034_u:6991_1: śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6993: tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni /
SA20bsa034_u:6994_0: yāvaccāsyāṃ [bodhisattva]bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya-dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:6994_1: sthāsyati pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā
SA20bsa034_u:6995: yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6996: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:6999: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat /
SA20bsa034_u:7000: teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
